overview:
Originally from a financial services background Mike also specialised in property investment. Realising the potential of the internet for generating enquiries and new business for companies across the board, Mike rapidly built up a strong business and reputation within the overseas property market.

All of his sales leads were generated via the Internet using tried and tested online marketing techniques. As the business grew to encompass over 380 property websites that generate a massive 4000+ enquiries per year, other property companies sought advice and help from Mike for their own online marketing efforts. As such, Artemis Internet Marketing was founded back in 2003.

Now offering a consultancy service to a wide range of businesses each looking to improve their online reach, enquiries and sales, Mike has forged an unrivalled position that combines a wealth of business experience and sales success with a no-nonsense attitude to advising companies with nothing less than transparent advice delivered in plain English.

Always keeping ahead of the game and constantly monitoring changes and new methods in the industry, Artemis Internet Marketing, driven by Mike, has a solid position in the industry whilst maintaining a highly personalised service and high client retention rate that is seemingly absent from many rival companies.
